title: Cloud Video Intelligence API - Live label detection
abstract:
# Cloud Video Intelligence API - Live label detection
**    Beta     ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
The Video Intelligence Streaming API supports live label detection with streaming input of multimedia data, and streaming output of analysis results in real-time.
The following [JSON configuration object](https://github.com/google/aistreamer/tree/master/ingestion/client/cpp/config/label.json) shows how to use [AIStreamer](https://github.com/google/aistreamer/tree/master/ingestion) live label detection to annotate a streaming video.
```
{    "video_config": {        "feature": "STREAMING_LABEL_DETECTION",        "label_detection_config": {            "stationary_camera": "False"        }    }}
```
The AIStreamer returns a response similar to the following example.
```
Reading response.0.0s: mustang horse  (0.9374721646308899)0.0s: herd           (0.9230296611785889)0.0s: horse          (0.9789802432060242)
``
